column5: Beautiful new house with all the amenities of home! 3 bedrooms, 2 baths -- Stunning open floor plan , beautiful kitchen with bar area. Central Air/Heat, Microwave, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer. No carpet , all tile floor . Features 4 flat screen tvs and a dvd player. Large covered decks front and back,downstairs outdoor shower , short walk to the beach, House is located in quiet area of beach that is wider and has less traffic. Great family house and area
